works.description: For those the uber-rich who have a taste for aquatic cruises, speedboats hold a special place of importance. We have earlier shown you the Aquariva speedboat by Gucci in collaboration with Riva, which was created to mark the 90th anniversary of Gucci as a luxury brand. The latest entrant into the similar place is the Ferretti Riva Virtus speedboat that looks to combine technology and style for water cruises.
